Uses of Class
org.freedesktop.dbus.connections.config.SaslConfigBuilder

Packages that use SaslConfigBuilder
Package
Description
org.freedesktop.dbus.connections.config
 

  • Uses of SaslConfigBuilder in org.freedesktop.dbus.connections.config

    Methods in org.freedesktop.dbus.connections.config that return SaslConfigBuilder
    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    SaslConfigBuilder<R>
    TransportConfigBuilder.configureSasl()
    Switch to the SaslConfigBuilder to configure the SASL authentication mechanism.
    Use SaslConfigBuilder.back() to return to this builder when finished.
    SaslConfigBuilder<R>
    SaslConfigBuilder.withAuthMode(TransportBuilder.SaslAuthMode _types)
    Setup the authentication mode to use.
    SaslConfigBuilder<R>
    SaslConfigBuilder.withSaslUid(Long _saslUid)
    Setup the user ID to use for authentication when using unix sockets.
    Will default to the user ID of the user running the current process.
    SaslConfigBuilder<R>
    SaslConfigBuilder.withStrictCookiePermissions(boolean _strictCookiePermissions)
    Enable/disable checking of file permissions of the cookie files (used for DBUS_COOKIE_SHA1).
    Cookie permission check will only be used on Linux/Unix like OSes.
    Default is false (no strict checking).
